languages.text: "Подавление малых культов нанесло по ним сильный удар. Вернув паству в верное стойло, мы обеспечили им меньший приток новобранцев, чем они могли бы заполучить".
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
languages.original_text: "Подавление малых культов нанесло по ним сильный удар. Вернув паству в верное стойло, мы обеспечили им меньший приток новобранцев, чем они могли бы заполучить".

traits.locale_text: "The suppression of the minor cults have been a huge blow for them. By returning the flock to the loyal stable, we have cut down their possible amount of new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults have been a huge blow for them. By returning the flock to the loyal stable, we have cut down their possible amount of new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

languages.text: “之前在镇压小型教派时，我们给他们造成了沉重的打击。我们成功地将牧群带回了忠诚的牧人手中，给他们招募新成员的计划造成了阻碍。”
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."

traits.locale_text: “之前在镇压小型教派时，我们给他们造成了沉重的打击。我们成功地将牧群带回了忠诚的牧人手中，给他们招募新成员的计划造成了阻碍。”

languages.text: «La eliminación de los cultos menores les asestó un duro golpe. Al devolver el rebaño a un establo leal, hemos reducido la posible cantidad de sus nuevos reclutas».
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."

traits.locale_text: «La eliminación de los cultos menores les asestó un duro golpe. Al devolver el rebaño a un establo leal, hemos reducido la posible cantidad de sus nuevos reclutas».

languages.text: 「奴らは魔女団の少数派の弾圧により痛手を被った。群れを忠実な厩舎に戻すことで、奴らの新たな仲間の数を減らすことができた」
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは魔女団の少数派の弾圧により痛手を被った。群れを忠実な厩舎に戻すことで、奴らの新たな仲間の数を減らすことができた」

languages.text: « L'éradication des cultes mineurs leur a infligé un terrible coup. En renvoyant ce troupeau vers une étable qui nous est fidèle, nous les avons empêchés de se trouver de nouvelles recrues. »
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."

traits.locale_text: « L'éradication des cultes mineurs leur a infligé un terrible coup. En renvoyant ce troupeau vers une étable qui nous est fidèle, nous les avons empêchés de se trouver de nouvelles recrues. »

languages.text: "Durch die Unterdrückung der kleineren Kulte haben wir ihnen einen schweren Schlag versetzt. Wir haben die Zahl ihrer potenziellen neuen Rekruten drastisch verringert, indem wir die Herde wieder in einen treuen Stall geführt haben."
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."

traits.locale_text: "Durch die Unterdrückung der kleineren Kulte haben wir ihnen einen schweren Schlag versetzt. Wir haben die Zahl ihrer potenziellen neuen Rekruten drastisch verringert, indem wir die Herde wieder in einen treuen Stall geführt haben."

languages.text: "Ufak çaplı tarikatların sindirilmesi, onlara ağır bir darbe indirdi. Cemaat mensuplarını sadakate yönelterek aralarına katılması muhtemel şahısların sayısını da azalttık."
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."
